changeLanguage: Change the language in the application
subsScreenDesc: OneApp offers three types of subscriptions: starter, medium, gold. Each has different benefits, which one will you try ?
starterDesc: Basic access to core benefits witch a lower monthly cost.
mediumDesc: More benefits, higher limits and better overall value.
textNormal: Get 20% off your first visit to the fitness center and save on your first workout.
qrInstruction: Show this QR code to staff
loginSubtitle: Log in to your OneApp account and continue discovering new benefits and places.
forgotSubtitle: Enter your email address to receive a reset link and regain access to your account
newSubtitle: Set a strong new password to enhance security and protect your account
createSubtitle: Join the OneApp ecosystem and start discovering new benefits and places.
signupSuccess: Account has been created! Check your email for verification.
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
emailChangeMessage: Email change requested. Please check your new email for confirmation link.
profileUpdatedEmail: Profile updated. Please check your email for confirmation.
logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
onboardingSubtitle: Select the categories you're interested in. We'll show you relevant places and benefits.
onboardingNoBranches: No places found in selected categories
onboardingSubscriptionSubtitle: Get access to exclusive benefits and discounts at all partner locations.
onboardingSubscriptionNote: You can skip this step and subscribe later from your profile.
name: Name
reviewText1: Excellent facilities and very professional staff. The personal trainers are knowledgeable and motivating. Best gym in Nitra!
reviewText2: Great gym overall. Equipment is top-notch and staff is friendly. Only downside is it can get crowded during peak hours.
reviewText3: Amazing atmosphere! Clean locker rooms, modern machines, and the staff always greets you with a smile.
reviewText4: Been coming here for 6 months and I've seen great results. The group classes are fantastic!
reviewText5: Good gym but parking can be a challenge. Inside everything is perfect though.
reviewText6: Love the new renovations! The cardio section is now twice as big. Highly recommend.
reviewText7: Friendly environment, great equipment selection. Personal trainers really know their stuff.
reviewText8: Perfect for beginners. Staff helped me create a workout plan on my first day.
reviewPlaceholder: Share your experience with this place...
replyThankYou: Thank you for the kind words! We're glad you enjoy our gym.
replyAgree: I totally agree, best gym in the city!
replyPeakHours: Thanks for the feedback! We recommend visiting before 4 PM for a quieter experience.
replyParking: We're working on expanding parking options. Thank you for your patience!
holidayNote: * During holidays, opening hours may vary. For more information, please contact the venue.
signInToActivate: Sign in to activate this benefit
needAccountForBenefits: You need an account to redeem and track your benefits

benefit1Desc: Get 20% off your first visit to the fitness center and save on your first workout.
benefit2Desc: Bring a friend for free to one training session.
benefit3Desc: Enjoy a complimentary sauna session when you book any 60-minute workout slot.
benefit4Desc: Bring a friend along for free on your next visit. Limited to one guest per member.
benefit5Desc: Save on branded towels, bottles, and gear in the reception shop.
benefit6Desc: Book a 20-minute intro session with a personal trainer to set your goals.
benefit7Desc: Access to the gym between 6:00 and 9:00 for early-bird workouts.
benefit8Desc: Try a new seasonal smoothie recipe every week at a special price.
benefit9Desc: Upgrade to a premium locker for a week with extra space and a secure lock.
feedOfferDescDiscount20: Get 20% off your first entry when you activate this offer.
feedOfferDescFreeEntryFriend: Bring your friend for free and train together today.
feedOfferDescDiscount10Monthly: Save 10% on your monthly pass this week.
feedOfferDescDiscount15Today: Use this offer today and get 15% off your purchase.
feedOfferDescTwoForOne: Buy one entry and get the second one free.
feedOfferDescFirstMonthFree: Start now and enjoy your first month free.
feedOfferDescPersonalTrainer: Get a guided session with a personal trainer included.
feedOfferDescDiscount25Weekend: Get 25% off selected services during the weekend.
feedOfferDescFreeTowel: Receive a free towel service with your visit.

cardsAllowCameraScan: Allow camera to scan your card.
cardsFindNumberHint: You can find the card number on your card or in the app.
